author: andschwa
body: This resolves #1004 and will use the latest released asset in the future. The download script is as complicated as it is because this is a private repo, thus access to the assets must be done through the API with authentication. This all can go away when we go public. I'm not a big fan of the Perl usage, but `grep -oP` is not available on OS X. @JamesWTruher is probably about to come up with a much better Perl expression :ocean: /cc @vors --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1008)
title: Refactor to get latest asset ID using API
